[et_pb_section bb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”off” specialty=”off” next_background_color=”#ffffff” _builder_version=”3.0.106″ background_color=”#00008b”][et_pb_row][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.0.106″ background_layout=”light”]

Telephone Merchant Account

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section bb_built=”1″ prev_background_color=”#00008b”][et_pb_row][et_pb_column type=”3_4″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.0.106″ background_layout=”light”]

Let Your Mail Order or Telephone Sales Business Shine with Our Virtual Terminal

A virtual terminal account with DigTech Services is the easiest way for your business to accept debit and credit cards over the phone and through the mail! No longer wait for checks or money orders to arrive before you process orders – with our system, you can receive payment in the matter of moments so that you can ship out your customer’s products.

Best yet, when you use our virtual terminal system for phone and mail orders, you get an easy to use system that allows you to review and manage orders in real time. It saves time, it saves money and it helps you grow your business.

A telephone merchant account is also perfect for businesses who sell services to customers and need to take credit card payments over the phone or by mail. Giving your customers the ability to pay how they want puts your business on top when it comes to providing superior customer service. All you need to do is give us a call today to apply for a telephone merchant account!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
